        public InspectionToolWrapper getTool()
        Warning: Usage of this method is discouraged as if separate tool options are defined for different scopes, it just returns the options for the first scope which may lead to unexpected results. Consider using getInspectionTool(PsiElement) instead.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        an InspectionToolWrapper associated with this tool.
